message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and features, I propose a price of $120 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $105 for it. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. Considering the value of the product and aiming for mutual satisfaction, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $110 for the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
